Header: Former Deputy General Manager Programmes of ITN Vipula Rathnasiri passes away
Content: Former Deputy General Manager Programmes of ITN Vipula Rathnasiri has passed away. He joined the ITN at its commencement in 1979 and became the head of the Drama Unit in 1994. Thereafter, he held several posts including Assistant Manager Programmes, Manager Programmes and Deputy General Manager Programmes. The remains of Mr. Vipul Rathnasiri are lying at his residence at number 375, Temple Road, Webada North, Kirillawala, Kadawatha. The funeral is scheduled to be held at 4.00 pm tomorrow at Webada North General Cemetery.
